review: Amazon Fire TV Stick is great little toy to turn your not so smart tv into a smart tv. Well made and functionality is very good. Easy to navigate and very intuitive menus. It is pretty standard in device features as the PS3, PS4, Apple TV, Roku, smart DVD players, etc. but the interface is one of the better ones. So, it is totally necessary if you have one of those devices as the features will overlap with those devices. However, Amazon Fire Stick does come with some strings attached. Not all features are compatible with all devices (phones, tablets) and there are limits if not fully integrated into the Amazon family. I bought this purely for the mirroring of your device to the tv screen, but found out my Lenovo Yoga 2 tablet is not compatible with the machine. However, my Samsung S4 works with mirroring screen to the tv but it is not what I was looking for.Here are some key points. Amazon Fire TV stick will be great if...............1. You are member of Amazon Prime.2. You have a compatible device (phones, tablets). Amazon, Samsung, LG, some others they list as compatible.If you are not fully integrated into the Amazon family you will be somewhat disappointed as you will be limited in some of the features. The customer service were very helpful in trying to help so support is decent.
